name: On Fire (Toly)
description:
Play with A and D keys or arrows.

Oh no, thats another typical accident that can happen anytime. Your head is on fire and you cant control your legs. You have to reach to the water barrel before it's too late! Can you save those 3 workers? We made this game in 48 hours for the GMTK Game Jam 2020. The theme was "Out Of Control". Enjoy. And don't play with fire.
